product.name: Litanika Oversized King Quilt Bedding Set 128x120 Inch Super King Taupe Comforter Bedspreads Lightweight Bed Coverlets Boho Bedding Cover Decor All Season3 Pieces (1 Quilt 2 Pillowcases)
product.description: [[FEEL THE DIFFERENCE] Features a sophisticated design of diamond stitched quilt pattern with solid taupe both front and reverse suitable for you who like simple life style. Different from those ultrasonic printing quilts Litanika adopts high-cost thread sewing. The neat stitches increase the durability of the quilt comforter set stabilize the filling which is better at keeping you warm also give a classic and romantic charm to your bed. [PACKAGE INCLUDES] Available in Litanika 3 Pieces Super King Plus Quilt Set: 1 Quilt (128"x120") for super king plus bed 2 Pillow Shams (20"x36"). If you want to have enough overhang for the sides like advertised you may purchase a larger size. *Note: The pillow insert is not included. [LIGHTWEIGHT AND SOFT] Are you tired of heavy quilts? As the temperature rises you need a lightweight quilt to reduce the burden on your body. Litanika breathable quilted set has good air permeability so it wonâ€™t retain too much heat causing you to toss and turn. Super soft microfiber is stitched in a multilayered construction that makes the quilt lightweight and durable. Covering it you will experience a better and more cozy sleep which can help you relieve the tiredness of the whole day. [MULTI PURPOSE USAGE] Characterized by special treated fabric Litanika quilt sets are suitable for different skin types and perfect for families with kids. You can enjoy it in the bedroom on the sofa in the living room or use it as bedding set in your RV. Moreover the quilt is suitable for all seasons. You can simply use it on its own in spring and summer or use it as a bedspread or coverlet in autumn and winter. All these make the quilt set become a great gift choice. [DURABLE & EASY CARE] Machine washable. Washed at room temperature on gentle cycle sun-dry or tumble dry on low heat setting. Do not bleach or iron. High-quality materials with non-fading and non-shrinking are better than others. No tearing after washing but soften for long lasting comfort. *Due to the use of vacuum package the quilt will arrive shriveled and wrinkled please wash and dry it to puff it and remove the wrinkles.]
